name: Pokemon Go Game Boy
description:
It's Pokemon Go as a Game Boy game! This is what the game might have been like if it had come out during the 8 bit era.

Making of Video! If you are interested in the development of the game, I have a making of video up on my YouTube Channel.

Features
  • 19 custom pokemon to catch
  • A zoomable map to explore
  • A Pokedex full of funny descriptions
FunctionKeyboardConsoleMove character / netArrow KeysD-padConfirm / Throw NetZ / WA ButtonZoom in/out / Close NotebookX / QB ButtonCheck Notebook (Pokedex)EnterStart Button Credits:
